Text:
The quality is absolutely mind-blowing!
You're my hero!
Still waiting for your apocalypse now original version, please.
Sweeeeet thank you, i was hoping someone had the 1080 version
Is the resolution the same as original video on disc?

I've got and compared this to jonny's and original EuReKA's releases and noticed colouring here is more yellowish than both others and yet this appears to have been sharpened. Has anyone noticed the coloring deviation at least?
EuReKA also has a sample available that I recommend checking.
This yellowish colouring I noticed also in Kingdom's release of the movie Zodiac and could be caused (of course) by my system decoding capabilities.

It can't be played on PS3. It comes up as corrupt data. I've tried streaming it (without forcing transcode - as i'm on a old laptop) and copying it over to the PS3's harddrive with PS3 Media Server. I've also tried to playing and copying it over from a USB harddrive. 

Under the information tab, on the PS3, the correct file type; MP4 is shown but there is nothing under Lenght, Resolution and Video Codec.

Does anyone have an idea what's wrong?
Thank you so much for this! Such an amazing film.
Thank you for the absolute fine release!
